item.title: How to Fix Caching Issues With MoinMoin wiki
item.description: After making two changes to a MoinMoin powered page, the first change showed up immediately, the second one did not show up at all. Though the changes were visible both in the edit view, and in the history. Turns out this was a server-side caching issue which could be solved by choosing “More Actions” and then “Delete Cache” from the page’s menu.
